product_name: Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Munchies Mix - 3 oz.
long_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Munchies mix combines freeze-dried apples, grapes, blueberries, sour cherries, mangos, pineapple and raspberries for a tasty snack you can enjoy anywhere. No preparation necessary-just open the package and enjoy. Can also be added to cereal, cobblers, muffins, scones, pancakes, waffles and yogurt. Contents are equivalent to approximately 1 lb. of fresh fruit. Resealable package keeps the freeze-dried fruit crisp. Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Munchies mix has no additives, preservatives or sweeteners; naturally gluten, dairy, wheat and nut free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Munchies mix combines freeze-dried apples, grapes, blueberries, sour cherries, mangos, pineapple and raspberries for a tasty snack you can enjoy anywhere.
